health_discussed_people_names: Faith Mwende, Hamisi Musa Mwidani, Fadhili Mwalimu, Charles Kitula, Mwaka Zahoro, Moses Aran, Shebe Athman, Junior Wambua
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Engage with NACADA in developing programs and policies for awareness, treatment, and rehabilitation of persons with Substance Use Disorders. Initiate plans for establishing an affordable rehabilitation and rescue center with qualified personnel for medical care.
